explains: adj. 荒废的，破旧的，要塌似的；受破坏的
v. 使荒废（dilapidate 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: dilapidated building 破烂建筑物；危房

sentences.en: Small cars hoot and jostle in a race against three-wheeled auto-rickshaws, dilapidated buses, and the odd bullock cart.
sentences.cn: 道路上混杂着相互鸣笛争道的小型汽车、电动三轮车、破旧的公共汽车和牛拉单车。

sentences.en: The house is a little more dilapidated than when I last saw it.
sentences.cn: 这幢房子比我上次看到时更破一些了。

sentences.en: The walls of the dilapidated shed lean outward.
sentences.cn: 那座破棚屋的墙向外倾。
